GeDBIT.dist

接口 WeightMatrix

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    SymmetricSubstitutionWeightMatrix

    public interface WeightMatrix
extends java.io.Serializable
    A WeightMatrix is the substitution matrix of an Alphabet of Symbol objects. It defines the distance between each pair of Symbols of the AlphabetWeightMatrix, a weighted edit distance metric can be defined on Sequence or Fragment objects.
    版本:
    2004.03.02
    作者:
    Jack, Rui Mao, Weijia Xu, Willard

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Alphabet getAlphabet() 
      double getDistance(Symbol one, Symbol two) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAlphabet

        Alphabet getAlphabet()
        返回:
        the Alphabet over which this matrix is defined.

      • getDistance

        double getDistance(Symbol one,
                 Symbol two)
        返回:
        the distance between two Symbol objects in the Alphabet over which this matrix is defined.
